title: The previous update to OrgSidebar.tsx used a wrong API endpoint. Please update i...
decision:
The previous update to OrgSidebar.tsx used a wrong API endpoint. Please update it to use the correct one: `http://localhost:8000/api/system/agents`. 

Also, make sure the UI is rebuilt so the changes are visible.
